0.ngo_name: Social Educational Cultural Preservation and Dvp Society
0.Major_Activities1: We have been able to increase the intake of students since our inception on an incremental basis year by year. Students of the school have been actively participating in various national day celebrations such as independence day republic day. Through the use of renewable energy for electricity generation and heating of waters for providing facilities to the children in school and hostel we have been a model for others in the mountainous region. We have been carrying out initiatives to educate.
